alert.note: Alert for Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winona, northern Olmsted and Wabasha Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Oronoco, or 7 miles north of Rochester, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported penny sized hail near Douglas, MN. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elgin around 740 PM CDT. Plainview around 745 PM CDT. Wabasha and Kellogg around 755 PM CDT. Alma around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include South Troy, Pioneer Campground, Rattelsnake Point, Potsdam, Hidden Meadows R V Park, West Albany, Kings Park, Rattlesnake Ridge, Bremen and Theilman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
